quoteText:
Changes to This Policy

We may revise this Data Use Policy from time to time. The most current version of the policy will govern our use of your information and will always be at https://openhumans.org/data-use/. If we make changes that we believe will substantially alter your rights, we will email you and prominently display a notice on our site 7 days before we make those changes.
title: When the service wants to change its terms, users are notified a week or more in advance.

tosdr.case: When the service wants to change its terms, users are notified a week or more in advance.
